GSP29nysu51pu:0: NySBh_5,1.0 sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vikalpāj jātibahutvam iti saṃkṣepeṇoktaṃ,
GSP29nysu51pu:1: tad vistareṇa vibhajyate tāḥ khalv imā jātayaḥ sthāpanāhetau prayukte caturviṃśatiḥ pratiṣedhahetavaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:3_0: NySBh_5,1.1 jāteḥ saṃkṣepeṇoktāyā vistaro vaktavya itīdānīm ārabhyate sādharmyādisūtram
GSP29nysu51pu:8: NySBh_5,1.2 sādharmyeṇopasaṃhāre sādhyadharmaviparyayopapatteḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:10: dravyaṃ loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaḥ kriyāvāṃs tathā cātmā tasmāt kriyāvān iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:11: evam upasaṃhṛte paraḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavatiṣṭhate niṣkriya ātmā vibhuno dravyasya niṣkriyatvād vibhu cākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ ca tathā cātmā tasmān niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:12: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyasādharmyād niṣkriyeṇeti /
GSP29nysu51pu:14: atha vaidharmyasamaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukto loṣṭaḥ paricchinno dṛṣṭo na ca tathātmā tasmān na loṣṭavat kriyāvān iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:15: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyād akriyeṇeti viśeṣahetvabhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:16: vaidharmyeṇa copasaṃhāraḥ niṣkriya ātmā vibhutvāt kriyāvad dravyam avibhu dṛṣṭaṃ niṣkriyaṃ loṣṭaḥ na ca tathātmā tasmān niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:17: vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dravyam ākāśaṃ kriyāhetuguṇarahitaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na ca tathātmā tasmān na niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:18: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyavaidharmyāt kriyāvateti viśeṣahetvabhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:19_0: atha sādharmyasamaḥ kriyāvāṃl loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukto dṛṣṭaḥ tathā cātmā tasmāt
GSP29nysu51pu:19_1: kriyāvān iti na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyo na punaḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt
GSP29nysu51pu:21_0: NySBh_5,1.3 sādharmyamātreṇa vaidharmyamātreṇa ca sādhyasādhane pratijñāyamāne syād
GSP29nysu51pu:21_1: avyavasthā sā tu dharmaviśeṣe nopapadyate gosādharmyād gotvāj jātiviśeṣād gauḥ sidhyati
GSP29nysu51pu:22: aśvādivaidharmyād gotvād eva gauḥ sidhyati na guṇādibhedāt /
GSP29nysu51pu:23: tac caitat kṛtavyākhyānam avayavaprakaraṇe pramāṇānām abhisambandhāc caikārthakāritvaṃ samānaṃ vākye iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:27: yadi kriyāhetuguṇayogāl loṣṭavat kriyāvān ātmā loṣṭavad eva sparśavān api prāpnoti /
GSP29nysu51pu:28: atha na sparśavāṃl loṣṭavat kriyāvān api na prāpnoti viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:30: loṣṭaḥ khalu kriyāvān avibhur dṛṣṭaḥ kāmam ātmāpi kriyāvān avibhur astu viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:31: khyāpanīyo varṇyo viparyayād avarṇyaḥ tāv etau sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmau viparyasyato varṇyāvarṇyasamau bhavataḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:32: sādhanadharmayukte dṛṣṭānte dharmāntaravikalpāt sādhyadharmavikalpaṃ prasañjayato vikalpasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:33: kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiṃcid guru yathā loṣṭaḥ kiṃcil laghu yathā vāyuḥ evaṃ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiṃcit kriyāvat syād yathā loṣṭaḥ kiṃcid akriyaṃ yathātmā viśeṣo vā vācya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:34: hetvādyavayavasāmarthyayogī dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ taṃ dṛṣṭānte prasañjayataḥ sādhyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:35: yadi yathā loṣṭas tathātmā prāptas tarhi yathātmā tathā loṣṭa iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:36: sādhyaś cāyam ātmā kriyāvān iti kāmaṃ loṣṭo 'pi sādhyaḥ atha naivaṃ na tarhi yathā loṣṭaḥ tathātmā //
GSP29nysu51pu:40: siddhaṃ ca kiṃcitsādhatmyād upamānaṃ yathā gaus tathā gavaya iti tatra na labhyo gogavayayor dharmavikalpaś codayitum /
GSP29nysu51pu:41: evaṃ sādhake dharme dṛṣṭāntādisāmarthyayukte na labhyaḥ sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor dharmavikalpād vaidharmyāt pratiṣedho vaktum iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:43: NySBh_5,1.6 yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ tenāviparīto 'rtho 'tidiśyate prajñāpanārtham /
GSP29nysu51pu:44: evaṃ sādhyātideśād dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne sādhyatvam anupapannam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:45: NyS_5,1.7 prāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvād aprāptyāsādhakatvāc ca prāptyaprāptisamau //
GSP29nysu51pu:46: NySBh_5,1.7 hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyaṃ sādhayed aprāpya vā ?
GSP29nysu51pu:47: na tāvat prāpya prāptyām aviśiṣṭatvād asādhakaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:48: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyāṃ kiṃ kasya sādhakaṃ sādhyaṃ vā ?
GSP29nysu51pu:49: aprāpya sādhakaṃ na bhavati nāprāptaḥ pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:50: prāptyā pratyavasthānaṃ prāptisamaḥ aprāptyā pratyavasthānam aprāptisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:53: NySBh_5,1.8 ubhayathā khalv ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇāni prāpya mṛdaṃ ghaṭādikāryaṃ niṣpādayanti abhicārāc ca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam aprāpya sādhakatvam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:54: NyS_5,1.9 dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇānapadeśāt pratyavasthānāc ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntasamau//
GSP29nysu51pu:55: NySBh_5,1.9 sādhanasyāpi sādhanaṃ vaktavyam iti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:56: kriyāhetuguṇayogī kriyāvāṃl loṣṭa iti hetur nāpadiśyate na ca hetum antereṇa siddhir astīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:58: kriyāvān ātmā kriyāhetuguṇayogād loṣṭavad ity ukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate kriyāhetuguṇayuktam ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dṛṣṭam iti kaḥ punar ākāśasya kriyāhetuguṇaḥ ?
GSP29nysu51pu:62: NySBh_5,1.10 idaṃ tāvad ayaṃ pṛṣṭo vaktum arhati atha ke pradīpam upādadate kimarthaṃ veti ?
GSP29nysu51pu:64: atha pradīpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇāḥ pradīpāntaraṃ kasmān nopādadate ?
GSP29nysu51pu:65: antareṇāpi pradīpāntataṃ dṛśyate pradīpaḥ tatra pradīpadarśanārthaṃ pradīpopādānaṃ nirarthakam /
GSP29nysu51pu:66: atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ kimartham ucyata iti aprajñātasya jñāpanārtham iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:69: sa khalu “laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānta” iti tatprajñāpanārthaḥ kāraṇāpadeśo nirarthaka iti prasaṅgasamasyottaram //
GSP29nysu51pu:72: NySBh_5,1.11 pratidṛṣṭāntaṃ bruvatā na viśeṣahetur apadiśyate anena prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭānataḥ sādhako na dṛṣṭānta iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:73: evaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntahetutve nāhetur dṛṣṭānta ity upapadyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:74: sa ca kathaṃ hetur na syāt ?
GSP29nysu51pu:77: NySBh_5,1.12 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte apara āha prāg utpatter anutpanne śabde prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇaṃ nāsti,
GSP29nysu51pu:82: NyS_5,1.13 tathābhāvād utpannasya kāraṇopapatter na kāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:84: utpannaḥ khalv ayaṃ śabda iti bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:86: utpannasya śabdabhāvāc chabdasya sataḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:87: kāraṇopapatter ayukto 'yaṃ doṣaḥ “prāg utpatteḥ kāraṇābhāvād” iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:88: NyS_5,1.14 sāmānya+dṛṣṭāntayor aindriyakatve samāne nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:89_0: NySBh_5,1.14 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte hetau saṃśayena
GSP29nysu51pu:89_1: pratyavatiṣṭate sati prayatnānantarīyakatve asty evāsya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyakatvam,
GSP29nysu51pu:93: NyS_5,1.15 sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyantasaṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyupagamāc ca sāmānysyāpratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:94: NySBh_5,1.15 viśeṣād vaidharmyād avadhāryamāṇe 'rthe puruṣa iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:96: evaṃ vaidharmyād viśeṣāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād avadhāryamāṇe śabdasyānityatve nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ na labhate /
GSP29nysu51pu:99: gṛhyamāṇe ca viśeṣe nityaṃ sādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur iti nābhyupagamyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:100: na hi gṛhyamāṇe puruṣasya viśeṣe sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur bhavati //
GSP29nysu51pu:102: NySBh_5,1.16 ubhayena nityena cānityena ca sādharmyāt pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ pravṛttiḥ prakriyā /
GSP29nysu51pu:103: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ekaḥ pakṣaṃ pravarttayati,
GSP29nysu51pu:104: dvitīyaś ca nityasādharmyāt pratipakṣaṃ pravarttayati nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāc chabdatvavad iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:105: evaṃ ca sati prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur anityasādharmyeṇa ucyamāno na prakaraṇam ativarttate ,
GSP29nysu51pu:112: NySBh_5,1.17 ubhayasādharmyāt prakriyāsiddhaṃ bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyāsiddhir uktā bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:114: tatra ekataraḥ pratipakṣa ity evaṃ saty upapannaḥ pratipakṣo bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:123: tat sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet /
GSP29nysu51pu:129: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam iti hetur ahetunā na viśiṣyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:134: nirvartanīyasya nirvṛttir vijñeyasya vijñānam ubhayaṃ kāraṇato dṛśyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:136: yat tu khalūktam asati sādhye kasya sādhanam iti ?
GSP29nysu51pu:137: yat tu nirvatyate yac ca vijñāpyate tasyeti //
GSP29nysu51pu:139: NySBh_5,1.20 pūrvaṃ paścād yugapad vā pratiṣedha iti nopapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:142: NySBh_5,1.21 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad iti sthāpite pakṣe arthāpattyā pratipakṣaṃ sādhayato 'rthāpattisamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:143: yadi prayatnānantarīyakatvād anityasādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:145: asti cāsya nityena sādharmyam asparśatvam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:147: NyS_5,1.22 anuktasyārthāpatteḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvād anaikānatikatvāc cārthāpatteḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:148: NySBh_5,1.22 anupapādya sāmarthyam anuktam arthād āpadyate iti bruvataḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvāt,
GSP29nysu51pu:149: anityapakṣasiddhāv arthād āpannaṃ nityapakṣasya hānir iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:152: yadi nityasādharmyād asparśatvād ākāśavac ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:156: na khalu vai ghaṇasya grāvṇaḥ patanam ity arthād āpadyate dravāṇām apāṃ patanābhāva iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:157: NyS_5,1.23 ekadharmopapatter aviśeṣe sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhāvopapatter aviśeṣasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:158: NySBh_5,1.23 eko dharmaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ śabdaghaṭayor upapadyata ity aviśeṣe ubhayor anityatve,
GSP29nysu51pu:163: NyS_5,1.24 kvacit taddharmopapatteḥ kvacic cānupapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:164: NySBh_5,1.24 yathā sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor ekadharmasya prayatnānantarīyakatvasyopapatter anityatvaṃ dharmāntaram aviśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:167: atha matam anityatvam eva dharmānataraṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra syād iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:168: evaṃ khalu vai kalpyamāne anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sadbhāvopapatter iti pakṣaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP29nysu51pu:174: tasmāt sadbhāvopapatteḥ sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅga iti nirabhidheyam etad vākyam iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:175: sarvabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvopapatter anityatvam iti bruvatānujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvaṃ,
GSP29nysu51pu:178: NySBh_5,1.25 yady anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate śabdasyety anityaḥ śabdo nityatvakāraṇam apy upapadyate 'syāsparśatvam iti nityatvam apy upapadyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:179: ubhayasyānityatvasya nityatvasya ca kāraṇopapattyā pratyavasthānam upapattisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:181: NySBh_5,1.26 ubhayakāraṇopapatter iti bruvatā nānityatvakāraṇopapatter anityatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:187: ekasya nityatvānityatvaprasaṅgaṃ vyāhataṃ bruvatoktaṃ pratiṣedha iti cet ?
GSP29nysu51pu:191: NySBh_5,1.27 nirdiṣṭasya prayatnānantarīyakatvasyānityatvakāraṇasyābhāve 'pi vāyunodanād vṛkṣaśākhābhaṅgajasya śabdasyānityatvam upalabhyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:195: NySBh_5,1.28 prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti bruvatā kāraṇata utpattir abhidhīyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:197: yadi ca kāraṇāntarād apy utpadyamānasya śabdasya tad anityatvam upapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:199: na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhiḥ, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysu51pu:202: gṛhyeta caitad asyāgrahaṇakāraṇam udakādivat, na gṛhyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:204: NyS_5,1.29 tadanupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhau tadviparītopapatter anupalabdhisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:207: abhāvasiddhau hetvabhāvāt tadviparītam astitvam āvaraṇādīnām avadhāryate /
GSP29nysu51pu:208: tadviparītopapatter yatpratijñātaṃ “na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhir ity” etan na sidhyati /
GSP29nysu51pu:209: so 'yaṃ “hetur āvaraṇādyanupalabdher” ity āvaraṇādiṣu cāvaraṇādyanupalabdhau ca samayānupalabdhyā pratyavasthito 'nupalabdhisamo bhavati //
GSP29nysu51pu:220: so 'yam āvaraṇādyanupalabheḥ anupalambha upalabdhyabhāve 'nupalabdhau svaviṣaye pravarttamāno na svaviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhati /
GSP29nysu51pu:225: tadupalabdheḥ svaviṣayapratipādikāyā abhāvād anupalambhād anupalabdher viṣayo gamyate na santy āvaraṇādīni śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇānīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:231: asti me saṃśayajñānaṃ nāsti me saṃśayajñānam iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:233: seyam āvaraṇādyanupalabdhir upalabdhyabhāvaḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ nāsti me śabdasyāvaraṇādyupalabdhir iti nopalabdhyante śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇāny āvaraṇādīnīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:234: tatra yad uktaṃ tadanupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhir iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:238: 5,1.32 anityena ghaṭena sādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti bruvato 'sti ghaṭenānityena sarvabhāvānāṃ sādharmyam iti sarvasyānityatvam aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:239: so 'yam anityatvena pratyavasthānād anityasama iti // NySBh_
GSP29nysu51pu:242: NySBh_5,1.33 pratijñādyavayavayuktaṃ vākyaṃ pakṣanivartakaṃ pratipakṣalakṣaṇaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:247: NyS_5,1.34 dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāt tasya cobhayathābhāvān nāviśeṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:248: NySBh_5,1.34 dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñāyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:255: sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ cāśritya bhavān āha “sādharmyāt tulyadharmopapatteḥ sarvānityatvaprasaṅgād anityasama” iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:257: aviśeṣasamapratiṣedhe ca yad uktaṃ tad api veditavyam //
GSP29nysu51pu:258: NyS_5,1.35 nityam anityabhāvād anitye nityatvopapatter nityasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:260: tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam athānityam ?
GSP29nysu51pu:262: dharmasya sadā bhāvād dharmiṇo 'pi sadā bhāva iti nityaḥ śabda iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:267: NyS_5,1.36 pratiṣedhye nityam anityabhāvād anitye 'nityatvopapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:268: NySBh_5,1.36 pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anityatvasya bhāvād ity ucyamāne 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvam,
GSP29nysu51pu:269: anityatvopapatteś ca “nānityaḥ śabda” iti pratiṣedho nopapadyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:271: nityam anityatvasya bhāvād iti hetur na bhavatīti hetvabhāvāt pratiṣedhānupapattir iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:274: yo 'yaṃ paripaśnaḥ tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati atha neti,
GSP29nysu51pu:276: kasmāt ? utpannasya yo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad anityatvam ;
GSP29nysu51pu:277: evaṃ ca saty adhikaraṇādheyavibhāgo vyāghātān nāstīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:279: nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca ekasya dharmiṇo dharmāv iti virudhyete,
GSP29nysu51pu:281: tatra yad uktaṃ nityam anityatvasya bhāvān nitya eva,
GSP29nysu51pu:285: yasya prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ tat khalv abhūtvā bhavati,
GSP29nysu51pu:287: anityam iti ca bhūtvā na bhavatīty etad vijñāyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:288: evam avasthite prayatnakāryānekatvād iti pratiṣedha ucyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:291: tat kiṃ prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ śabdasyāho 'bhivyaktir iti viśeṣo nāsti /
GSP29nysu51pu:295: NySBh_5,1.38 sati kāryānyatve anupalabdhikāraṇopapatteḥ prayatnasyāhetutvaṃ śabdasyābhivyaktau /
GSP29nysu51pu:296: yatra prayatnānantaram abhivyaktis tatrānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ vyavadhānam upapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:301: hetoś ced anaikāntikatvam upapadyate anaikātikatvād asādhakaḥ syād iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:305: kiṃcit pratiṣedhati kiṃcin neti anaikāntikatvād asādhaka iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:306: atha vā śabdasyānityatvapakṣe prayatnānantaram utpādo nābhivyaktir iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:307: nityatvapakṣe 'pi prayatnānantaram abhivyaktir notpāda iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:308: so 'yam ubhayapakṣasamo viśeṣahetvabhāva ity ubhayam apy anaikātikam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:310: NySBh_5,1.40 sarveṣu sādharmyaprabhṛtiṣu pratiṣedhahetuṣu yatra yatrāviśeṣo dṛśyate tatrobhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyata iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:312: NySBh_5,1.41 yo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvam āpadyate so 'yaṃ pratiṣedhasya vipratiṣedhe 'pi samānaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:313: tatrānityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti sādhanavādinaḥ sthāpanā prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:314: “prayatnakāryānekatvāt kāryasama” iti dūṣaṇavādinaḥ pratiṣedhahetunā dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:316: tasyāsya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ vipratiṣedha ucyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:317: tasmin pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvaṃ caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:318: NyS_5,1.42 pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //
GSP29nysu51pu:319_0: NySBh_5,1.42 pratiṣedhaṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya taduddhāram akṛtvānujñāya
GSP29nysu51pu:319_1: pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe tṛtīyapakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvam iti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasañjayato
GSP29nysu51pu:319_2: dūṣaṇavādino matānujñā prasajyata iti pañcamaḥ pakṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:320: NyS_5,1.43 svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:321: NySBh_5,1.43 sthāpanāpakṣe prayatnakāryānekatvād iti doṣaḥ sthāpanāhetuvādinaḥ svapakṣalakṣaṇo bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:323: so 'yaṃ svapakṣalakṣaṇaṃ doṣam apekṣamāṇo 'nuddhṛtyānujñāya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity upapadyamānaṃ doṣaṃ parapakṣe upasaṃharati /
GSP29nysu51pu:324: itthaṃ cānaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedha iti hetuṃ nirdiśati /
GSP29nysu51pu:325: tatra svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣayopapadyamānadoṣopasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe ca saty anena parapakṣadoṣo 'bhyupagato bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:328: tam anuddhṛtya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity āha /
GSP29nysu51pu:329: evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayataḥ parapakṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣo bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:330: yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā prasajyata iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:331: tathāsyāpi sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayato matānujñā prasajyata iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:334: pratiṣedhahetuvādinaḥ dvitīyacaturthaṣaṣṭapakṣāḥ teṣāṃ sādhvasādhutāyāṃ mīmāṃsyamānāyāṃ caturthaṣaṣṭayor arthāviśeṣāt punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:335: caturthapakṣe samānadoṣatvaṃ parasyocyate “pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe pratiṣedhadoṣavad doṣa” iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:336: ṣaṣṭe 'pi “parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣa” iti samānadoṣatvam evocyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:339: tṛṭīyapakṣe 'pi “pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa” iti samānatvam abhyupagamyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:344: prathamadvitīyayor viśeṣahetvabhāva iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayor asiddhiḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:346: yadā “pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa” ity evaṃ pravarttate /
GSP29nysu51pu:348: yadā tu “kāryānyatve prayatnāhetutvam anupalabdhikāraṇopapatter” ity anena tṛṭīyapakṣo yajyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:350: nābhivyaktir” iti siddhaḥ prathamapakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata iti //
